documentation.text:
@notice Sets the governance address. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newGovernance The new governance address to set.

@notice Sets the treasury address. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newTreasury The new treasury address to set.

@notice Sets the treasury fee. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newTreasuryFee The new treasury fee to set.

@notice Returns the governance address.
 @return address The governance address.

@notice Returns the treasury address.
 @return address The treasury address.

@notice Returns the treasury fee.
 @return uint16 The treasury fee.

@notice Returns the treasury address and treasury fee in a single call.
 @return tuplee First, the treasury address, second, the treasury fee.

@notice Sets the governance address. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newGovernance The new governance address to set.

@notice Sets the treasury address. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newTreasury The new treasury address to set.

@notice Sets the treasury fee. This function can only be called by governance.
 @param newTreasuryFee The new treasury fee to set.

@notice Returns the governance address.
 @return address The governance address.

@notice Returns the treasury address.
 @return address The treasury address.

@notice Returns the treasury fee.
 @return uint16 The treasury fee.

@notice Returns the treasury address and treasury fee in a single call.
 @return tuplee First, the treasury address, second, the treasury fee.

returns._0: tuplee First, the treasury address, second, the treasury fee.

params.currency: The currency to query the whitelist for.

returns._0: bool True if the queried currency is whitelisted, false otherwise.

params.newGovernance: The new governance address to set.

params.newTreasury: The new treasury address to set.

params.newTreasuryFee: The new treasury fee to set.

params.currency: The currency to add or remove from the whitelist.
params.toWhitelist: Whether to add or remove the currency from the whitelist.

getTreasuryData().notice: Returns the treasury address and treasury fee in a single call.

isCurrencyWhitelisted(address).notice: Returns whether a currency is whitelisted.

setGovernance(address).notice: Sets the governance address. This function can only be called by governance.

setTreasury(address).notice: Sets the treasury address. This function can only be called by governance.

setTreasuryFee(uint16).notice: Sets the treasury fee. This function can only be called by governance.

whitelistCurrency(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a currency from the whitelist. This function can only be called by governance.

userdoc.notice: This is the interface for the ModuleGlobals contract, a data providing contract to be queried by modules for the most up-to-date parameters.
